status: Aug 13: Canada (hamstring) is expected to be sidelined for at least two weeks, Kendra Andrews of ESPN reports.
Aug 15: Reese (back) is doing "on-court activities" during her progression to returning to the floor, Karli Bell of Marquee Sports Network reports.
Jun 24: The Sky announced Tuesday that Vandersloot (knee) had successful ACL surgery, Kareem Copeland of The Washington Post reports.
Jun 10: Harris (knee) will miss the rest of the 2025 season after undergoing a procedure on her left knee, Grant Afseth of The Next reports.
Jul 25: Thornton has undergone successful right knee surgery, and she will be out for the rest of the season.
Aug 11: Clark (groin) has been ruled out for Tuesday's game against the Wings, Chloe Peterson of The Indianapolis Star reports.
Aug 8: The Fever announced Friday that Colson has been diagnosed with a torn left ACL and will miss the rest of the season.
Aug 8: The Fever announced Friday that McDonald has been ruled out for the remainder of the 2025 campaign after being diagnosed with a broken bone in her right foot.
Jul 24: Parker-Tyus (not injury related) hopes to return for the WNBA playoffs, Callie Fin of the Las Vegas Review-Journal reports.
Aug 15: Collier (ankle) is listed as doubtful for Saturday's game against the Liberty.
Aug 15: Harrison (concussion) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Lynx, Myles Ehrlich of Winsidr.com reports.
Aug 7: Stewart (knee) is expected to return to the floor in late August,Jackie Powell of The IX Basketball reports.
Aug 7: Sabally (knee) is scheduled to be re-evaluated Aug. 18, Jackie Powell of TheNextHoops.com reports.
Aug 14: Austin (leg) is out for Friday's game against the Fever, Kareem Copeland of The Washington Post reports.
May 16: Amoore underwent successful surgery to repair her right ACL injury, the Mystics announced Friday.
